item.title: Mamdani Aide: Make NYC Housing 'Worth Less' Via Rent Control
item.description: New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani's top housing official once declared plans to make property "worth less" through the use of rent control.

item.title: Rep. Randy Fine to Newsmax: ICE Just Trying to Do Its Job
item.description: Protesters need to "stay out of the way" of Immigration and Customs Enforcement officers who are just trying to do their jobs, Rep. Randy Fine, R-Fla....

item.title: Julie Menin Elected New York City Council's First Jewish Speaker
item.description: The New York City Council unanimously elected councilwoman Julie Menin, a Democrat, as its speaker on Wednesday.
